content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operation at (-15, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0) mining coal
- Wooden chest at (23.5, -16.5) storing coal (125 units)

### Iron Mining Operation at (-14, 23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0) mining iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) storing iron ore (639 units)

### Copper Processing Line at (20, 20)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0) mining copper ore
- Input wooden chest at (20.5, 21.5) storing copper ore (5 units)
- Middle wooden chest at (22.5, 21.5) storing copper ore (423 units)
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0)
- Output wooden chest at (24.5, 17.5) storing copper plates (53 units)
- Burner inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving items from furnace to output chest
- Burner inserter at (22.5, 22.5) attempting to feed furnace from middle chest

### Unused Furnaces
Two stone furnaces at:
- (-11.0, 20.0)
- (-9.0, 20.0)
Both currently without ingredients

ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Placement Issues
- Ensure inserters are placed with correct orientation and valid pickup/drop positions
- When placing inserters, verify there is a valid destination entity at the drop position
- Current issue: Furnace input inserter at (22.5, 22.5) has no valid destination entity at its drop position (22.5, 23.5)

### Furnace Operation Issues
- Multiple furnaces are idle due to lack of ingredients despite available resources nearby
- Ensure proper connection between storage chests, inserters, and furnaces
- Verify the complete input-output chain is properly connected before expecting production

### Resource Management
- Some furnaces have excess fuel (furnace at 24.0, 20.0 has "furnace fuel source is full" warning)
- Consider balancing fuel distribution more efficiently across machines
